titles.title: Chou Akuukan Bouheki Cheese Neapolitan
超亜空間防壁チーズ・ナポリタン

anime.description: Full 3D CG two-minute anime special featuring GMO`s two female mascots, http://anidb.net/ch62658 [Mikumo Anzu] and http://anidb.net/ch62659 [Mikumo Conoha], who live in virtual reality and fight off the invasions of bug-like creatures. — written by Singan Note: GMO was distributing the special on 15000 (5000 each day) free DVDs at the Comic Market 85 event at booth 314 from December 29 to 31.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: PIC NEEDS IMPROVEMENT
tag.description: This entry has a poor picture and needs to have it replaced by a higher-quality alternative. Causes may include: it is too small; its colours or lighting are bad; it has excessive compression or other encoding issues; it is from non-anime sources (anime/char); the face is hard to see (char/creator); the hair/eye/skin colours do not match the anime (char); it does not represent their usual appearance (char); among others. If you can, please swap a better picture in and remove this tag. Thank you.

character.name: Mikumo Anzu
character.description: Mikumo Anzu is the official mascot character for GMO Internet`s GMO Application Cloud cloud server service.

character.name: Mikumo Conoha
character.description: Mikumo Conoha is the official mascot character for the company`s VPS service ConoHa byGMO.
